nodes.text: Collected Poems, Prayers, and Meditations on the Force

The Collected Poems, Prayers, and Meditations on the Force was a set of writings collected and edited by Kozem Pel, a Disciple of the Whills. The collection contained writings by a number of spiritual figures, along with the Guardian's Mantra, the Jedi Code, the Code of the Sith, and the Coxixian Prayer for the Departed.
